metadata.title: CVE-2017-5950 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - negligible.
metadata.description:
The SingleDocParser::HandleNode function in yaml-cpp (aka LibYaml-C++) 0.5.3 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (stack consumption and application crash) via a crafted YAML file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-5950` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libyaml-cpp0.6 - 0.6.3-9
No subscription required

notes.note: leosilva> by https://github.com/jbeder/yaml-cpp/issues/650 it seems fix in issue #459 is incomplete.

criterions.comment: yaml-cpp package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.6.3-9').
